reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 71/20: LIMITATION UNDER SECTION 25 OF THE ACT - NOISE BY-LAWS IN CONNECTION WITH DELIVERY OF GOODS
reg_info.reg_name_text: LIMITATION UNDER SECTION 25 OF THE ACT — NOISE BY-LAWS IN CONNECTION WITH DELIVERY OF GOODS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 71/20: LIMITATION UNDER SECTION 25 OF THE ACT - NOISE BY-LAWS IN CONNECTION WITH DELIVERY OF GOODS

content.content: 1. For the purposes of section 25 of the Act, the City does not have power to prohibit and regulate with respect to noise made in connection with the delivery of goods in the City.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of section 25 of the Act, the City does not have power to prohibit and regulate with respect to noise made in connection with the delivery of goods in the City.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for amendments to this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for amendments to this Regulation).

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
